memberdef.type: protected ref map< int, ref Widget >
memberdef.name: m_Layouts

briefdescription.para: Registers new layout and ties effect IDs to it.

simplesect.para: Order of layout creation matters, they get layered on top of each other. Within a single layout, widget priorities govern the widget order.

parameterdescription.para: int ID of effect widget type
int UserID of a widget to be used instead (allows multiple types to use single widget) InitWidgetSet(EffectWidgetsTypes.MASK_BREATH,true,BREATH);

simplesect.para: All child widgets MUST be of the same type if special functionality is required (ImageWidget etc.)

memberdef.argsstring: (typename handled_type, array< ref Widget > input, int type, int user_override)
memberdef.name: CreateHandledClass

briefdescription.para: returns all vanilla effects, nested in a vanilla layout. If using different layouts for custom effects, please register and link separately
